verses.text: I \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w mercies|strong="G3628"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, that ye \w present|strong="G3936"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w bodies|strong="G4983"\w* \w a|strong="G2378"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w*, \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w acceptable|strong="G2101"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \add which is\add* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w reasonable|strong="G3050"\w* \w service|strong="G2999"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G4964"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w conformed|strong="G4964"\w* \w to|strong="G0165"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* be ye \w transformed|strong="G3339"\w* by the \w renewing|strong="G0342"\w* \w of|strong="G3563"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w*, \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* may \w prove|strong="G1381"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* \w that|strong="G2307"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w acceptable|strong="G2101"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w*, \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, to every \w man|strong="G3956"\w* that \w is|strong="G5607"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w think|strong="G5252"\w* \add of himself\add* more \w highly|strong="G5252"\w* \w than|strong="G3844"\w* he \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w think|strong="G5426"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* to \w think|strong="G5426"\w* \w soberly|strong="G4993"\w*, according \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w dealt|strong="G3307"\w* to every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* the \w measure|strong="G3358"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w as|strong="G2509"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G4234"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w office|strong="G4234"\w*:

\w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w we|strong="G2070"\w*, \add being\add* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*, \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* one of \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w* \w gifts|strong="G5486"\w* \w differing|strong="G1313"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* that is \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w*, \add let us prophesy\add* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w proportion|strong="G0356"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*;

\w Or|strong="G1535"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*, \add let us wait\add* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \add our\add* \w ministering|strong="G1248"\w*: \w or|strong="G1535"\w* he that \w teacheth|strong="G1321"\w*, \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1319"\w*;

\w Or|strong="G1535"\w* he that \w exhorteth|strong="G3870"\w*, \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w exhortation|strong="G3874"\w*: he that \w giveth|strong="G3330"\w*, \add let him do it\add* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w simplicity|strong="G0572"\w*; he that \w ruleth|strong="G4291"\w*, \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w diligence|strong="G4710"\w*; he that sheweth \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w*, \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w cheerfulness|strong="G2432"\w*.

\add Let\add* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* be without \w dissimulation|strong="G0505"\w*. \w Abhor|strong="G0655"\w* that which is \w evil|strong="G4190"\w*; \w cleave|strong="G2853"\w* to that which is \w good|strong="G0018"\w*.

\add Be\add* kindly \w affectioned|strong="G5387"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w* with brotherly \w love|strong="G5360"\w*; in \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* \w preferring|strong="G4285"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*;

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* \w slothful|strong="G3636"\w* in \w business|strong="G4710"\w*; \w fervent|strong="G2204"\w* in \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*; \w serving|strong="G1398"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*;
\w Rejoicing|strong="G5463"\w* in \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*; \w patient|strong="G5278"\w* in \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w*; continuing \w instant|strong="G4342"\w* in \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w*;
\w Distributing|strong="G2841"\w* to the \w necessity|strong="G5532"\w* of \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*; given \w to|strong="G1377"\w* \w hospitality|strong="G5381"\w*.

\w Bless|strong="G2127"\w* them which \w persecute|strong="G1377"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*: \w bless|strong="G2127"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w curse|strong="G2672"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*.

\w Rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* them that do \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w weep|strong="G2799"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* them that \w weep|strong="G2799"\w*.

\add Be\add* \w of|strong="G5426"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w mind|strong="G5426"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*. \w Mind|strong="G5426"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* high \w things|strong="G5308"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w condescend|strong="G4879"\w* to men of low \w estate|strong="G5011"\w*. \w Be|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w wise|strong="G5429"\w* \w in|strong="G3844"\w* your own \w conceits|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w Recompense|strong="G0591"\w* to no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w for|strong="G0473"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*. \w Provide|strong="G4306"\w* things \w honest|strong="G2570"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* it be \w possible|strong="G1415"\w*, as much as lieth \w in|strong="G1537"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, live \w peaceably|strong="G1514"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

Dearly \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w avenge|strong="G1556"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \add rather\add* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* unto \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w Vengeance|strong="G1557"\w* \add is\add* \w mine|strong="G1698"\w*; \w I|strong="G1473"\w* will \w repay|strong="G0467"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w enemy|strong="G2190"\w* \w hunger|strong="G3983"\w*, \w feed|strong="G5595"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w if|strong="G1437"\w* he \w thirst|strong="G1372"\w*, \w give|strong="G4222"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w drink|strong="G4222"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* in \w so|strong="G5124"\w* \w doing|strong="G4160"\w* thou shalt \w heap|strong="G4987"\w* \w coals|strong="G0440"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w*.

\w Be|strong="G3528"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w overcome|strong="G3528"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w overcome|strong="G3528"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*.
